name: Moleman- The Great Escape
description:
Moleman- The Great Escape

Escape from the moles and survive as long as you can in the dark caves with only a little light to guide you and a lot of enemys to run from!

You play as ”Moleman” a mining-worker that is stuck in a cave infested by moles.
The object to the game is to Survive as long as you can with the moles running after you.

To Survive even longer in the cave you can collect coins to buy new items, like flash-bangs
and nightvision-googles. You can upgrade the duration of items or cut down the cooldown-time.

If you survive long enough you will experience events like ”Gold-Rush” or ”Rampage”, modes that you also can upgrade to make it even more exciting to reach the events!

Enter the cave and try to survive longer than your friends!

FEATURES
● Arcade-mode with endless gameplay, get the best high scores.
● Store with loads of upgrades for items and game-events.
● Use keys to unlock bonus-levels and upgrades.
● Use Coins to costomise your ”Moleman” with the item-slots and play the
game the way you like to play it”
